name: Aroma Veil
description: This Pokemon lets off a nice smell that helps you to stay relaxed even under stressful situations.
effect: User and Allies in range are immune to the effects of the moves: Taunt, Torment, Attract, Disable, Quash, Encore, and Heal Block. User and Allies ignore the effect of the move Psychic Noise but receive damage from the attack as normal.
